name: Achto Ahmo Tlali
description:
- Hey! Hey! Wake up! We are on a unknown planet...

Achto Ahmo Tlati (nahuatl for undead land) is an exploration puzzle game where you have to recover the other half of your ship. This other half happens to be inside that weird looking pyramid.

Decide the faith of some ruins

In order to get inside the pyramid, you have to collect materials and repair some ruins. You could also destroy them to have materials faster, but they will be silenced forever...

An unknown place, legacy of others

What will happen if you destroy all the ruins you could? Or repair them all? Is there something else? Maybe a ... Story of some sort?
